#summary Main wiki page for Midnight Mars Browser
#labels Featured

Midnight Mars Browser is a program used to download Mars Exploration Rover (MER) images and view them in slideshow and panorama format.  Version 2.0 is an Eclipse Rich Client Platform (RCP) Java application.
